Title: Great and Marvelous

Verses.3:
Great and marvelous are your works,[*]
	Lord God Almighty.
Your ways are righteous and true,[*]
	King of the Nations.
Verses.4:
Lord, who will not fear you and bring glory to your name?[*]
	For holy are you alone.
Before you all nations will come and worship,[*]
	for your righteous works have been revealed to all.

Changes: 2024-01-31 - Constance McIntosh Smith: Implement her editorial feedback.
